author: Cécile Fougeron and Lise Crevier-Buchman and Corinne Fredouille and Alain Ghio and Christine Meunier and Claude Chevrie-Muller and Jean-Francois Bonastre and Antonia Colazo-Simon and Céline Delooze and Danielle Duez and Cédric Gendrot and Thierry Legou and Nathalie Lévêque and Claire Pillot-Loiseau and Serge Pinto and Gilles Pouchoulin and Danièle Robert and Jacqueline Vaissière and François Viallet and Coralie Vincent
title: The DesPho-APaDy Project: Developing an Acoustic-phonetic Characterization of Dysarthric Speech in French
